com.ginrummy

Class GinRummyGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ginrummy.GinRummyGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GinRummyGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The GinRummyGame class represents the logic for playing the Gin Rummy card game. It manages player turns, gameplay, and calculates the deadwood count for each player.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        Starts the game and manages the sequence of player turns until a player wins or the game ends in a draw. Player shuffle the deck, and draw som crads and sort them which are in his hand

      • getIsGameOver

        public boolean getIsGameOver()
        Check if the game is ended if stock pile is empty or player hand gets empty.
        Returns:
        the boolean that tells if game end or not
